Model

Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Country

  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains all the data members and methods related to each country.

    • Constructor Summary

      This method adds additional army units to a country object in gameGraph

      Add a new country object to gameGraph adjacency list
      static boolean addNeighbour(java.lang.String countryWithNewNeighbour, java.lang.String neighbour, Graph gameGraph)
      This adds new neighhbor country number in ArrayList of neighbors in country.adjlist.neighbours and also adds the country's number in new neighbor's Arraylist of neighbors

      checks if all the countries has an owner
      static boolean assignOwner(java.lang.String ownerName, java.lang.String countryName, Graph g)
      this assign an owner to a country without owner
      static boolean changeOwner(java.lang.String newOwnerName, java.lang.String countryName, Graph g)
      this updates the owner name for a country in Database.adjlist
      static boolean checkExistenceOfCountry(java.lang.String countryToCheck, Graph gameGraph)
      checks the existence of the country in Database.adjlist
      static boolean fortify(java.lang.String fromCname, java.lang.String toCountryName, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies, Graph gameGraph)
      This allows a player to move any number of armies from his owned country to any of his owned neighbor country, leaving behind atleast 1 army unit.
